    • Method Detail

      • printColor

        public static int printColor(double[] RGBvalues)
        This class determine the color of the sample by comparing the sample RBG value to the measured RGB value of each target color. If it belong to none of them, return 4.
        Parameters:
        RGBvalues - This is the RGB value detected by the color sensor
        Returns:
        The number of the corresponding color (1 for blue, 2 for green, 3 for yellow, 4 for red, 0 for other)
